hCard 9 - extracting geo singular and paired values test

This page was design to comprehensively test the geo format. Most of these tests are based on Mike Kaply work for the Firefox. The IsEqualToGeo method canonicalise and compares geo's.

From: hCard test suite 1.0

Author: Glenn Jones

Tests:

Test Result Comment
vcard[0].geo.latitude IsEqualToGeo("37.77") Should find latitude value from single element
vcard[1].geo.latitude IsEqualToGeo("37.77") Should extract latitude value from paired value

History:

  • Created: 10 May 2008 by Glenn Jones
